title: Pennsylvania Vehicle Code Statutes (75 Pa.C.S.)
description: Key Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes traffic provisions for defense packet generation
disclaimer: This is informational only and not legal advice. Statutes may have been amended. Always verify current law.

speeding.title: Maximum speed limits
speeding.description: Establishes maximum speed limits on Pennsylvania highways and roads
defensePoints: Calibration of speed measurement device (SPMDEE requirements)
Road conditions at time of violation
Speed limit posting requirements per 75 Pa.C.S. 3363
speeding.typicalFine: 35-200+ depending on speed and location (plus $92.50 in fees)

recklessDriving.title: Reckless driving
recklessDriving.description: Operating a vehicle in willful or wanton disregard of safety
defensePoints: Lack of willful or wanton conduct

penalties.licenseSuspension: 6-month suspension for second or subsequent offense

carelessDriving.title: Careless driving
carelessDriving.description: Driving in careless disregard of safety of persons or property

suspendedLicense.title: Driving while operating privilege is suspended or revoked
suspendedLicense.description: Operating a vehicle with a suspended, revoked, or cancelled license

noInsurance.title: Required financial responsibility
noInsurance.description: Operating a vehicle without required liability insurance
defensePoints: Proof of coverage at time of stop
Insurance lapse was brief and unintentional

improperLaneChange.title: Driving on roadways laned for traffic
improperLaneChange.description: Requirements for safe lane changes and passing

failureToYield.title: Yield right-of-way
failureToYield.description: Requirements for yielding right-of-way in various situations
defensePoints: Other driver was not in hazardous proximity

followingTooClose.title: Following too closely
followingTooClose.description: Requirements for maintaining safe following distance

failureToSignal.title: Signals by hand and arm or signal lamps
failureToSignal.description: Requirements for turn and stop signals
defensePoints: Signal was given but not observed
Turn was not required in that location
Other drivers were aware of intentions

runningRedLight.title: Traffic-control signals
defensePoints: Light was yellow when entering intersection

stopSign.title: Stop signs and yield signs
stopSign.description: Requirements for stopping at stop signs

expiredRegistration.title: Registration and certificate of title required

equipmentViolation.title: Equipment violations
defensePoints: Equipment was functioning at time of stop

pointSystem.description: Pennsylvania Point System for Moving Violations

suspensionThresholds.6_points: Written warning and special examination may be required
suspensionThresholds.11+_points: License suspension (5 days per point over 10)

pointReduction.description: Points are removed at rate of 3 per year for safe driving

courtOptions: Plead not guilty and request trial

diversionEligibility.general: Pennsylvania does not offer traditional diversion programs for traffic violations
diversionEligibility.note: Some counties may offer accelerated rehabilitative disposition (ARD) for more serious offenses
requirements: Not available for standard traffic violations

generalProcedures.trafficSchoolNote: Pennsylvania does not offer traffic school to reduce points on plea bargaining - only by court order after conviction
